_header: The man that the hare I-met
_description: Burlesque charm by the names of a hare — introduction and conclusion of five couplets each, with forty-four lines of text of the names of the hare

BodDig86.First Lines:
Þe mon þat þe hare I metNe shal him neuere be
                    þe bet…
BodDig86.Last Lines:
…Þat þou come to me dedOþer in ciue oþer
                    in bred Amen
BodDig86.Attributed Title: Les nouns de vn leure en engleis (f. 168)

EETS
         s.s. 16 (1996).
